products.product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream, Body and Face Moisturizer for Dry Skin, Body Cream with Hyaluronic Acid and Ceramides, Daily Moisturizer, Oil-Free, Fragrance Free, Non-Comedogenic, 19 Ounce
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Face > Creams & Moisturizers > Face Moisturizers
products.description:
Developed with dermatologists, CeraVe Moisturizing Cream has a unique formula that provides 24-hour hydration and helps restore the protective skin barrier with three essential ceramides (1,3,6-II) and hyaluronic acid. This rich, non-greasy, fast-absorbing formula is ideal for sensitive skin on both the face and body Featuring our patented MVE Technology to release a steady stream of moisturizing ingredients throughout the day and night.
•Non-comedogenic•Fragrance-free•Oil-free•Hypoallergenic•Gentle, non-irritating formula•Suitable for sensitive skin
Key Ingredients:•MVE Technology: This patented delivery system continually releases moisturizing ingredients for 24-hour hydration•Ceramides: Essential for healthy skin, ceramides help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier
•Hyaluronic Acid: This ingredient attracts hydration to the skin’s surface and helps the skin retain moisture
features: [ HYALURONIC ACID MOISTURIZER ] With hyaluronic acid, ceramides and MVE technology for 24 hour hydration. Rich, velvety texture that leaves skin feeling smooth, it is absorbed quickly for softened skin without greasy, sticky, feel.

[ MOISTURIZER FOR DRY SKIN ] A deficiency of ceramides in skin can often be associated with dry skin, which can feel itchy and look flaky. CeraVe Moisturizing Cream is formulated with three essential ceramides & hyaluronic acid.

[ GENTLE DAILY MOISTURIZER ] For face and body or can be used as a hand cream for dry skin relief. Holds National Eczema Association (NEA) Seal of Acceptance. Fragrance free, paraben free, allergy-tested, and non-comedogenic.

[ 3 ESSENTIAL CERAMIDES ] Ceramides are found naturally in the skin and make up 50% of the lipids in the skin barrier. All CeraVe products are formulated with three essential ceramides (1, 3, 6-II) to help maintain the skin’s natural barrier.
[ DEVELOPED WITH DERMATOLOGISTS ] CeraVe Skincare is developed with dermatologists and has products suitable for dry skin, sensitive skin, oily skin, acne-prone, and more.

And our lip makeup is designed to last, providing a lip stain long lasting formula that won’t fade or budge throughout the day.

With the softest cotton at the tip from the end of the stick to the top of the swab and a gently flexible stick, Q-tips cotton swabs are perfect for a variety of uses. Different uses for our cotton swabs include beauty (apply or remove eyeliner & eye-shadow), baby care (delicately care for sensitive areas), home & electronics (clean and dust hard-to-reach spaces), and first aid (gently apply ointments and creams). Our paper sticks are sourced from sustainable forests. Q-tips cotton swabs are biodegradable when composted and our packaging is recyclable. Q-tips cotton swabs are made with 100% pure cotton. The “Q” stands for Quality, something we’ve stood by since our founding by Leo Gerstenzang in 1923. We’re proud of our history, commitment to the environment, and legacy of softness and quality. Today, Q-tips cotton swabs are the leading cotton swab brand and have been trusted for superior quality, versatility, and value for more than 85 years. Our swabs are light and portable, which makes them perfect for on-the go. We’re also thrilled to announce our Q-tips Beauty Rounds, a premium quality cotton pad for a wide range of beauty needs.
features: Q-Tips Cotton Swabs are the ultimate home, hygiene, and beauty tool.
The soft cotton buds on Q-tips Cotton Swabs are made with 100% cotton, and the paper sticks are sourced from sustainable forests.
Use a Q-tip Cotton Swab as an ear cleaner (the cotton pads make perfect ear swabs) or as a beauty tool.
The soft cotton sticks are delicate enough for sensitive jobs like baby hygiene; use a Q-tip to clean around your newborn's belly button or around your baby's nose.
Q-tips cotton swabs are also great for cleaning electronics; the cotton tipped applicators are perfect for dusting between the keys on computer keyboards or cleaning out phone ports.

products.product_name: Bio-Oil Skincare Body Oil Serum, Face and Body Moisturizer with Vitamin E & A, for Scars, Stretch Marks, Sensitive Skin, All Skin Types, Dermatologist Recommended, Non-Comedogenic, 2 Oz
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Body > Moisturizers > Oils
products.description:
Give your skin a break while stuck inside! It's the perfect time to take care of your skin with Bio-Oil Skincare Oil. Made for all skin types, this paraben-free body oil for dry skin can be used to help reduce the appearance of stretch marks, scars, and other marks due to surgery, injury, acne, aging, pregnancy, and more. This facial skin care product has a fast-absorbing, non-comedogenic formula that won't clog pores which is why it is the perfect face moisturizer for women. It helps the skin to retain essential moisture to soften skin and provide dry skin relief. Bio-Oil has a wide variety of uses and can be used as a facial moisturizer, lip moisturizer and hair moisturizer. Bio-Oil is also an oil for hair and because of its deeply moisturizing properties, Bio-Oil makes a great hair oil for black women. Additionally, Bio-Oil is a hair oil for dry and damaged hair and a hair oil for women with all hair types. Bio-Oil hair oil for curly frizzy hair and hair oil for men moisturizes and nourishes hair. It's truly a multi use oil that's recommended by skin care specialists. Use Bio-Oil as a beard oil, cuticle oil, hair oil, scalp oil, face oil, lip oil, and nail oil. The toxicological profile, chemical structure, level of inclusion and total level of daily exposure of each ingredient used has been assessed and deemed safe for use (including for use by pregnant women). Bio-Oil is proudly distributed in the USA by Kao USA, Inc. Satisfaction Guaranteed. Limitations may apply.
Bio-Oil is an award-winning specialist skincare product that is clinically proven to improve the appearance of scars, pregnancy stretch marks, and uneven skin tone. Thanks to PurCellin Oil, a proprietary laboratory copy of the preen gland oil of ducks, Bio-Oil is also effective for many other skin conditions such as aging and dehydrated skin.
features: HELPS IMPROVES APPEARANCE OF SCARS AND STRETCH MARKS - Dermatologist recommended and clinically proven for scars, stretch marks, uneven skin tone and so much more
PACKED WITH NATURAL OILS - Vitamin E helps maintain healthy looking skin while natural Chamomile and Lavender Oil calm and soothe
LOCKS IN ESSENTIAL HYDRATION WITHOUT CLOGGING PORES - Bio-Oil Skincare Oil is a uniquely formulated, non-greasy body oil that hydrates skin and helps retain essential moisture
PLANET & ANIMAL FRIENDLY — Vegan friendly, paraben free, cruelty free, non-comedogenic, and 100% recyclable
FORMULATED FOR ALL SKIN TYPES - Helps soften skin for all types, tones, textures and safe for use on face and body and won't clog pores

products.description:
Burt's Bees Beeswax Lip Balm instantly softens and hydrates your lips to help prevent dryness, cracking or chapping. Infused with responsibly sourced beeswax and vitamin E to richly moisturize and soothe lips, this lip balm will make your lips juicy, happy and healthy. You can conveniently tuck a tube of this moisturizing lip balm into your pocket or purse to keep natural, nurturing lip care at your fingertips. Playing by natures rules since 1984, Burts Bees uses ingredients from nature to nourish and revitalize your skin and lips, making products that have become a staple of your household. Burts Bees is the No. 1 dermatologist-recommended natural skin care brand (1). (1) Based on a September 2021 NielsenIQ national survey of U.S. Dermatologists.
By Burt's Bees

products.product_name: Al-Rehab Choco Musk Eau de Parfum Spray for Women, 1.65 oz/50 ml
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Fragrance > Women's > Eau de Parfum
products.description: Choco Musk is not just a fragrance; it's a delicate dance of sweet shades that captivates the senses. The delightful aroma begins with the chic allure of white musk, falling under the spell of incomparable white chocolate. Each note in the composition complements the other, creating a harmonious blend that emphasizes without overwhelming. As the fragrance unfolds, the middle notes gently merge, introducing spicy cinnamon, creamy vanilla, and the enchanting essence of rose. The base notes add a touch of oriental mystique, with exciting amber and myrrh weaving together with a noble sandalwood tint. The result is a sweet harmony that plays with shades of dessert perfumes in all their splendor. Choco Musk is a delicacy that transcends seasons, inviting you into a fairy-tale captivity of sweet indulgence. Whether it's the warmth of summer or the coziness of winter, let this fragrance be your year-round temptation, teasing and charming those around you. The 50ml Eau de Parfum bottle is an elegant testament to the luxurious experience that awaits you. With its refined design, it complements the richness of the fragrance within, enhancing the overall indulgence. Choco Musk isn't just a fragrance; it's a captivating tale of sweet temptation. Let it be your daily indulgence, a sensory journey into the heart of dessert-inspired luxury.
features: Choco Musk Eau de Parfum by Al-Rehab is a Aromatic fragrance for women
Top Notes: White Musk, Milk Chocolate and Vanilla
Middle Notes: Cinnamon, Rose and Sandalwood
Base Notes: Myrrh, Amber And Spicy Notes
Long lasting fragrance

products.product_name: Swiss Arabian Layali Rouge - Luxury Products From Dubai - Long Lasting Personal Perfume Oil Fragrance - A Seductive Signature Aroma - 0.5 Oz
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Fragrance > Women's > Eau de Parfum
products.description: Layali Rouge has all the fun and frolics of a cocktail. Opening with sweet and juicy mango, pineapple, lemon, papaya and florals, the tropical opening sets the tone for the fabulous night ahead. The fruity notes are soon joined by a burst of hypnotic roses and juicy peaches, before hibiscus and coconut catch the breeze and bring it all to a rich night time finale. Niche perfumery is a state of mind. Its perfumes circumvent the laws imposed by marketing and fall outside of the traditional commercial channels. Artisan fragrances are not developed based on a marketing study conducted by commercial brands, but originate from the imagination and artistic sensibility of a perfumer. Enjoy our wonderfully unique, luxury personal fragrances, made with only the highest quality ingredients. At Swiss Arabian, our expertise and passion, our knowledge of legendary Arabian perfumery, oriental craftsmanship and contemporary elegance, all come together to create fragrances that capture your imagination and celebrate your true essence. The history of Swiss Arabian is an enchanting tale that spans over 40 years. This pioneer in Arabian perfumes was founded in the year 1974 by a visionary with a wealth of knowledge and a deep passion for perfumery. Today, Swiss Arabian is the first perfume manufacturer in the UAE. We operate five modern manufacturing facilities spread across an area of 165,000 sq. ft., producing more than 35 million perfumes annually and export to over 80 countries.
features: LAYALI ROUGE: YOUR NEW SIGNATURE SCENT. Opens with finest notes of Papaya and uplifting Lemon. The beating heart of the fragrance brings out the deep resonance of Peach and Rose. Coconut and Hibiscus add depth to the aroma and inspire attention.

INTENSELY CONCENTRATED PERSONAL AROMAS. A more traditional approach to perfumery from the Middle East. Experience our exquisite and exclusive range of handmade perfume oils in traditional attar style. For an intense and long lasting aroma projection.

PURE QUALITY, ALCOHOL FREE FORMULATION. Perfect for sensitive skin types, our alcohol-free perfume oils are hypoallergenic and won't irritate skin. These all natural, hand crafted oils are safe for all and feature expertly curated fragrance notes.

THE PERFECT MIX OF CULTURES AND PERFUMES. Carrying a legacy rooted in a blend of Western & Oriental craftsmanship, Swiss Arabian is a brand founded on duality that proudly celebrates the space in which two seemingly opposite worlds come together.

AN AROMATIC EXPERIENCE FROM ACROSS THE SEAS. Born from precious beginnings and built on achievements aplenty, our exquisite creations will lead you on an aromatic journey of the senses that culminates in an impeccable moment that enchants forever.

products.product_name: Pacifica Island Vanilla Hair Mist Perfume and Full Body Spray for Women - Fragrance Spray for A Mood-Lifting Experience, Paraben-Free, Clean Beauty No Alcohol, Vegan & Cruelty-Free, 6 oz oz

products.description: Warm, Sweet & Clean Vanilla Bliss: Escape to a tropical island with every spray of Pacifica Island Vanilla Hair & Body Mist. This perfume mist envelops you in the comforting warmth of Tahitian vanilla bean, topped with a hint of jasmine and creamy sandalwood. Its delicious gourmand sweetness is balanced by subtle floral and earthy notes, creating a cozy, mood-lifting fragrance experience from head to toe. Hair & Body Perfume in One: Why choose between hair perfume and body spray when you can have both? This versatile mist is specifically formulated to be used all over – mist it in your hair for a gentle fragrance that lasts, and spritz on your wrists, neck, or anywhere on your skin for an all-day vanilla glow. The alcohol-free formula means it won’t dry out your hair or skin, making it perfect for daily use as your go-to signature scent. Long-Lasting Comfort Fragrance: Indulge in a scent that’s light enough for work or school, yet cozy and inviting for a night in. Pacifica’s Island Vanilla is a long-lasting vanilla mist that you can wear alone or layer with other perfumes and lotions for extra longevity. Spray it on your hair to enhance the scent’s staying power – the natural oils in your hair help the sweet vanilla aroma linger even longer. Whether you’re freshening up post-workout or starting your day, this mist’s warm, sweet aura will draw compliments without ever being overpowering. Clean, Vegan Ingredients: Feel good knowing this fragrance is made with care. Pacifica uses natural and essential oils to create our true-to-life scents. Island Vanilla Hair & Body Mist is 100% vegan and cruelty-free, and contains no parabens, phthalates, or sulfates. It’s a clean beauty pick that lets you enjoy a luxurious scent without guilt or irritation – perfect for those with sensitive skin or anyone prioritizing clean ingredients. Fragrance Notes: • Top: Lily of the valley, Lime blossom, Vanilla • Heart: Jasmine, Vanilla orchid • Base: Vanilla bean, Sugared cocoa, Vetiver, Sandalwood Discover Your Signature Vanilla: Whether you’re a longtime vanilla lover or just starting to explore gourmand scents, Pacifica Island Vanilla is an accessible little luxury for everyday wear. Its warm and sweet profile is comforting in cooler weather, yet uplifting and wearable any time of year. Embrace the “vanilla girl” trend with this multi-use mist that leaves you feeling cozy, confident, and irresistibly scented all day long.
features: Indulgent Island Vanilla Fragrance: Experience a deliciously warm, sweet gourmand vanilla aroma with hints of jasmine, vanilla orchid, sandalwood, and vetiver. This cozy, Tahitian vanilla–inspired scent has a touch of sugared cacao, wrapping you in a comforting, long-lasting vanilla embrace all day. A must-have indulgence for vanilla fragrance lovers seeking an exotic, cozy perfume.

2-in-1 Hair & Body Mist (Alcohol-Free): Enjoy a lightweight, alcohol-free mist designed for use on both hair and body. Spray it from head to toe – it gently scents your hair without drying and refreshes your skin with a delicate vanilla perfume mist. This versatile hair perfume & body spray is perfect for everyday wear, adding a sweet, warm scent to your routine without overpowering.

Long-Lasting, Layerable Scent: Long lasting for a mist, this vanilla body spray leaves a lingering scent that you can layer with other fragrances or lotions. Mist it on your hair to carry the cozy aroma with you all day – hair perfume application helps the scent last even longer. It’s a sweet vanilla mist that’s strong enough to garner compliments yet light enough for all-day wear, making it great for work, school, or a post-gym refresh.

Clean, Vegan Beauty: Crafted with natural and essential oils for a true-to-nature scent. Our formula is 100% vegan and cruelty-free, and we never use any harsh chemicals. This clean fragrance mist is phthalate-free, paraben-free, and sulfate-free, so you can spritz freely. Pacifica is a leader in clean beauty, so you can trust you’re misting on a safe, skin-friendly fragrance.

Everyday Comfort & Versatility: Embrace a cozy fragrance that fits any occasion. This warm vanilla mist is a hit among those who love comforting scents – from teenagers exploring sweet perfumes to adults chasing a nostalgic, gourmand perfume vibe. Use it as an everyday signature scent, for a confidence boost before a date, or to relax at home in your PJs. It’s the perfect accessory for the trending “vanilla girl” aesthetic, enveloping you in a warm, inviting aura wherever you go.

products.description: Lattafa Habik Eau de Parfum for Men is a bold and captivating fragrance that exudes strength and sophistication. It opens with a dynamic blend of cardamom, pepper, artemisia, and bergamot—creating a spicy-citrus introduction that is both fresh and invigorating. The heart unfolds with aromatic sage, soothing lavender, and a warm touch of cinnamon, adding depth and complexity. As the scent settles, a rich base of sandalwood, patchouli, tonka bean, amberwood, and musk delivers a smooth, earthy warmth that lingers elegantly. Perfect for the modern man, Habik is a powerful yet refined scent, ideal for both day and evening wear.

products.description: Maison Alhambra Luxe Gold Eau de Parfum is a golden expression of elegance—bright, smooth, and effortlessly refined. It opens with a fresh blend of lemon and orange, wrapped in the creamy depth of teak wood, offering a citrusy yet grounded introduction. The heart reveals a soft floral bouquet of jasmine and iris, enriched by warm balsamic undertones that add richness and sophistication. As it settles, the scent melts into a velvety base of amber and musk, leaving a radiant, lasting impression. Luxe Gold is a fragrance for those who shine without trying—subtle, luxurious, and timelessly captivating.
features: Graceful & Bright Feminine Fragrance: A radiant fusion of soft florals, delicate citrus, and creamy musk, capturing the elegance and charm of a refined woman
Fragrance Notes: Opens with zesty Bergamot and Mandarin, flows into a luminous heart of Amber, Cedarwood, and Orange Blossom, and settles into Cream, Musk, and Patchouli
Long-Lasting & Elegant Wear: Perfect for daytime sophistication or evening elegance, offering an enchanting scent trail that endures
Sleek & Feminine Bottle Design: Presented in a beautifully designed 3.4 fl oz bottle, making it an ideal gift or an elegant addition to your vanity
Ethically Crafted & Cruelty-Free: Formulated with care using vegan-friendly ingredients and never tested on animals

products.description: Introducing LATTAFA RAVE NOW 3.4 EDP SP, an irresistible fragrance that captivates all age groups with its unique blend of scents. This perfume is designed to leave a lasting impression wherever you go, making you feel confident and empowered. Embrace the vibrant and energetic essence of RAVE NOW as its refreshing top notes of Red Fruits and Orange. As time goes on, the heart notes of Marshmallow, Lily of the Valley and Jasmine, adding a touch of femininity and grace. Finally, the base notes of Vanilla, Moss and Musk, creating a harmonious fusion of scents that irresistibly lingers throughout the day. Crafted with precision, this Eau de Parfum Spray boasts an exquisite design that enhances the charm of its fragrance. Its elegant and sleek bottle embodies the essence of sophistication, making it a perfect addition to your vanity or a luxurious gift for a loved one. Whether you are attending a special occasion, going out with friends, or simply want to make an everyday statement, LATTAFA RAVE NOW 3.4 EDP SP is the ideal choice. Its long-lasting formula ensures that you remain enveloped in a captivating aura from dawn to dusk. Experience the magic of RAVE NOW and let its enchanting blend of scents unleash your inner confidence and leave a lasting impression wherever you go.

From facial cleansers to moisturizers and body care, each product is designed to complement daily life. Pair this foaming face wash with other Particle products for a complete regimen tailored to men.

products.description:

Tip: The base coat is designed to remain sticky, providing a solid foundation for the next coat of polish. (Note: The base gel should not be used as glue.)
High-Quality and Protective: Beetles Glossy No Wipe Top Coat and base, with proper application, can last with a perfect shine. The flexible top coat avoids nicks, chips, or smudges. Ideal Mother's Day gifts for her. Tips: Avoid touching your nails after curing the top coat for 2 minutes to enhance the shine.
Easy Application and Good Tenacity:If you have sensitive skin, we recommend using this product in conjunction with Liquid Peel off Latex Tape. This tape minimizes direct skin contact with the gel, reducing the chance of allergic reactions. It also helps in achieving more precise nail art. Please note that Liquid Peel off Latex Tape is not included with this product and must be purchased separately.
Reminder: In low temperatures, the base coat may become clumpy or thick, which can cause the brush to break off inside the bottle. If this happens, please contact us for satisfactory after-sales service. Tip: There's no need to wipe off the tacky residue of the base coat, as it helps the color coat adhere longer to your nails.If you feel a burning sensation during curing, it is recommended to remove your hand from the lamp. Resume curing once the sensation returns to normal.
Tips for preventing nail surface peeling off:(1) Polishing of the nail surface: Polish the front, side and trailing edge of the nail until there are no reflective spots on the nail surface(2) Nail surface cleaning: It is recommended to use Nail dehydrator to remove oil and moisture from the nail surface(3)Lighting time: It is recommended that the lighting time for base Coat, Color Gel and Top Coat at least 60 seconds.

By choosing resin rhinestones with similar or contrasting colors, you can create color-coordinated or highly contrasting works, such as phone cases with gradient effect or colourful festival decorations.

products.product_name: Freeman Flirty Feet Instant Foot Peeling Spray, Exfoliating Foot Mask For Summer, Moisturizing & Smooth Dry, Cracked Heels, Remove Dead Skin Quickly, Cruelty-Free & Vegan, 4 fl.oz./ 118 ml Bottle

products.description: The Freeman Flirty Feet Coconut and Aloe Revitalizing & Softening Instant Peeling Foot Spray is the perfect way to take care of the skin on your feet. And it's super easy! All you have to do is spray on the Freeman foot spray to reveal instantly soft and supple feet. This foot peeling spray helps to gently exfoliate and visibly remove dead skin cells. Coconut and Aloe work together to help moisturize soles and heels for rejuvenated looking feet. Freeman products are vegan and cruelty-free. They're also free of parabens, sulfates, silicone, phthalates, and mineral oils. Since 1976, Freeman has created feel-good formulas that seriously work (without losing all the fun!). We believe skincare belongs to everyone and strive to democratize beauty with affordable products. In our minds, clear skin = a clear conscious. Our top priority is ensuring our products are efficacious and full of good-for-you ingredients. Our new formulas are always dermatologist tested, free of parabens, sulfates, phthalates and mineral oil. We love our furry friends, too, and are proudly cruelty-free and never test on animals. From breakouts and blemishes to sensitive and dull complexions, we’re here to educate you on how to take care of your unique skin. We believe skincare is more than a routine... It’s about feeling good from the inside out!

products.description:

Note: Cap it tightly after each use to prevent drying. Before applying the nail tips, lightly buff the natural nail to remove shine and oil

The Nail glue gel cures under a UV LED lamp for 60-90 seconds, providing a bright, non-yellowing finish with strong adhesion. NOTE: The glue should not be applied to dark and UV-opaque fake nails. ❤️【Suit All Kinds of Nail Tips】UNA GELLA Gel Nail Glue is suitable for clear nail tips, acrylic nails, and soft gel tips, offering ultra-strong adhesion.

products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Foot, Hand & Nail Care > Tools & Accessories > Foot Pumices
products.description:
Natural Pumice Stone: The use of pumice stones to remove calluses on the feet originated in ancient Greece. It's the healthiest and most natural way to care for your feet. It can not only give you the exfoliation, but also relieve fatigue
Easy to Use ＆ Handle: The ergonomic design makes the pumice stone easy to use and hold in your hand. Rope rings allow your stones to be hung to dry, which is an important part of maintaining pumice stones
Remove Callus In More Efficient Way: Asqraqo's Lava pumice is a kind of natural porous stone, which is mildly abrasive and forms a porous material. It can treat your feet through safe and natural lava and make your feet feel smooth
How to Use: Pumice stones should be used on moist skin, so it's best to soak your feet in warm water, while moisten the pumice stone with soapy water and then rub it in a circular motion over the area to remove calluses and dead skin
GREAT GIFT SET & SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: 2Pcs pumice stone included in the package, you can share it with your family or friends. If you’re not completely satisfied for ANY reason, contact us

products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Foot, Hand & Nail Care > Tools & Accessories > Nail Tools > Nail Clippers
products.description:
ENGINEERED FOR FINGERNAILS: Dermatologist-designed with a compound curve that matches the natural shape of fingernails—EDJY is purpose-built for precision fingernail trimming, delivering a clean, accurate cut every time.
THE PERFECT LENGTH: Our patented safety stop prevents damaging your nails from cutting too short, protecting against infection and promoting healthier nails by leaving a doctor-recommended sliver of white.
SINGLE BLADE DESIGN: Crafted with a surgical-grade stainless steel blade for precise nail shaping, superior control, clean cuts, and a flawlessly smooth fingernail edge.
SUPERIOR MATERIALS: Constructed with martensitic stainless steel that's hardened to 60+ HRC, EDJY’s blade has the highest edge retention and rust resistance rating in the nail clipper industry.
ERGONOMIC ENGINEERING: Strategically positioned lever closer to the cutting point provides enhanced control with less force and more precision than traditional nail clippers.

products.product_name: CeraVe Therapeutic Hand Cream for Dry Cracked Hands With Hyaluronic Acid and Niacinamide, Fragrance Free 3 Ounce
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Foot, Hand & Nail Care > Foot & Hand Care > Hand Creams & Lotions
products.description:
Developed with dermatologists, CeraVe Therapeutic Hand Cream helps protect and restore the skin barrier from harmful irritants. It contains three essential ceramides (1, 3, 6-II) that help restore and maintain the skin's natural protective barrier. This fragrance-free hand cream also contains the skin protectant dimethicone, and the water-resistant, non-greasy, fast-absorbing, non-irritating formula features patented MVE Delivery Technology for 24-hour nourishment that restores and maintains smooth, soft skin.
•Fragrance-free•Gentle, non-irritating formula•Accepted by the National Eczema Association
Key Ingredients:•Ceramides: Essential for healthy skin, ceramides help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier•MVE Technology: This patented delivery system continually releases moisturizing ingredients for 24-hour hydration•Hyaluronic Acid: This ingredient attracts hydration to the skin’s surface and helps the skin retain moisture•Niacinamide: Helps calm the skin
features: [ SKIN PROTECTANT ] Non-greasy, fast-absorbing daily hand cream to help prevent and temporarily protect chafed, chapped, or cracked skin, especially to help relieve frequently-washed or over-worked hands.

[ MOISTURE-RETAINING INGREDIENTS ] Formulated with hyaluronic acid to help retain skin's natural moisture, niacinamide to help calm skin, dimethicone as a skin protectant, and ceramides to help restore the skin barrier.
[ NEA SEAL OF ACCEPTANCE ] Accepted by the National Eczema Association. To help soothe over-washed hands, cleanse with CeraVe Hydrating Cleanser and apply CeraVe Therapeutic Hand Cream.

[ 3 ESSENTIAL CERAMIDES ] Ceramides are found naturally in the skin and make up 50% of the lipids in the skin barrier. All CeraVe products are formulated with three essential ceramides (1, 3, 6-II) to help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier
[ DEVELOPED WITH DERMATOLOGISTS ] CeraVe Skincare is developed with dermatologists and has products suitable for dry skin, sensitive skin, oily skin, acne-prone, and more.

products.product_name: Toenail Clippers for Seniors Thick Toenails, Upgrade Angled Head Large Toe Nail Clippers for Men with Wide Jaw Opening, Sharp Heavy Duty Fingernail Clipper Cutter with Catcher Long Handle -Black
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Foot, Hand & Nail Care > Tools & Accessories > Nail Tools > Nail Clippers
products.description:
NO MORE BEND & MORE COMFORTABLE - Toenail clippers for seniors are ergonomically designed with bionic 7 shaped angled head, allowing you to see the blade and nails clearly so you can cut your nails accurately and confidently. With this angled nail clipper, no more twisting and bending your body to cut your toenails, great for the elderly, men, women, adult, ect.
CUT THICK NAILS EASILY - The jaws of the thick toenail clippers are about 5 times wider than the opening of a regular nail cutter and can open up to 9MM, allowing you to trim thick and hard nails with ease. Toenail clippers for thick toenails are ideal tools for trimming thick nails, hard nails, big toenails and even pet nails.
LONG HANDLE SAVES EFFORT - Large toenail clippers for thick nails comes with a 3.8-inch handle, the extended and widen handle conforms to the principle of leverage, which reduces the pressure needed when cutting nails, allowing you to cut hard and thick nails effortlessly. The non-slip textured design on the handle allows you to never worry about nail clippers for seniors slipping out of your hands.
CLEAN NAILS & CLEAN ROOM - Toe nail clippers for thick nails for seniors come with a catcher that collects nail clippings, effectively preventing nail clippings from splashing and hurting your eyes. Nail clippers with catcher can effectively keep your home clean after clipping nails, no more worry about leaving messy nail clippings on bed sheets, carpets, sofas, shoes, clothes or tables.
ULTRA SHARP STAINLESS STEEL BLADE - Nail clippers for men are made of premium stainless steel, after repeated grinding and polishing, the blades are sharper and more long lasting, which can trim nails smoothly without jagging or tearing. Invest in professional nail clippers and experience a comfortable and smooth nail trimming process that saves you time and energy.

An exceptional Root Touchup Spray Alternative for extending the time between salon visits, and more precise than the average hair fiber for easier hairline coverage.
Easiest To Use: Unlike other hair toppers for women, hair fibers for thinning hair for women, and hair thickening products for women, Boldify Hairline Powder makes it easy to cover thinning, root re-growth, balding and/or patchiness. The Compact mirrored travel kit design is ‘style change ready,’ Simply remove the base, dab it onto the applicator, and get the ultimate coverage and confidence, wherever you happen to be!

SHORT TO MEDIUM HAIR TYPE: To provide proper hold and volume, our texture powder is best for hair under 6 inches in length.
HOW TO USE: With your hand at least 2 inches from your head, apply 3-4 pumps of powder to dry hair. Use your fingers to evenly distribute the powder throughout your hair. If you need more hold, add some more product.
CONVENIENT SPRAY BOTTLE DESIGN: The spray bottle design allows you to get a consistent amount of powder every time. Simply take off the cap, pump, and style. No more making messes with shaker bottles.
QUALITY INGREDIENTS: Our Hair Texturizing Powder is 100% vegan and cruelty free. Made in The United States with no Sulfates, Parabens, or Phthalates. We only use 5 ingredients: Silica Silylate, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Starch, Silica, Mica, & Maranta Arundinacea Root Extract so you know exactly what you’re putting in your hair.

products.description: Introducing the CeraVe Gentle Hydrating Shampoo, hair care solution developed with dermatologists to ensure the gentle care for your scalp and hair. It is suitable for all hair types, including various curl patterns and color-treated hair. This gentle shampoo removes buildup from the scalp and hair while maintaining moisture, leaving your hair looking healthy and feeling soft. products.product_name: Men’s Rogaine 5% Minoxidil for Men Foam, Clinically Proven Regrowth for Thinning Hair, Topical Hair Loss Treatment, Unscented Topical Aerosol, Results in 8–16 Weeks, 3-Month Supply, 3 x 2.11 oz

products.description: Men’s Rogaine minoxidil for men foam is a clinically proven topical aerosol hair regrowth treatment featuring a 5% minoxidil formula to reactivate hair follicles and help regrow fuller, thicker hair. Designed for the early stages of thinning at the vertex (top of the scalp), this unscented minoxidil for men foam leverages Tricho-Prime Technology—a blend of botanical extracts, nourishing emollients, and alpha hydroxy acid (AHA)—to condition and gently exfoliate the scalp, help keep follicles open, and create an optimal environment for hair growth. Clinical studies show noticeable new hair regrowth in 12 weeks with consistent twice-daily use; individual timelines vary, and you may notice early signs between weeks 8–12 with fuller benefits around week 16. Because response can vary, you may experience initial shedding as weaker hairs make way for new growth; maintain consistent application to see the best results over time. To use, dispense approximately half a capful and apply directly to clean, dry thinning areas on the top of the scalp morning and night, gently massaging the product into the skin; allow it to dry completely before styling. The no-mess, quick-absorbing foam integrates seamlessly into daily routines and fits easily into your regular hair care regimen. Each pack provides a 3-month supply with three 2.11 oz bottles to support uninterrupted treatment and routine adherence. As a trusted hair loss treatment for men, this targeted foam penetrates the scalp to stimulate follicle activity and support hair protein production for visible regrowth with continued use. For best results, commit to consistent twice-daily application for at least 4 months to allow new growth to appear and mature; ongoing use is needed to maintain results. Rogaine is the #1 dermatologist-recommended hair growth product brand. If you’re ready to address hereditary hair loss at the vertex, choose the convenience of minoxidil for men foam and start your hair growth journey today.

products.product_name: LAURA GELLER NEW YORK The Best of the Best Baked Palette - Full Size - Includes Bronzer, Blush, 2 Highlighters and 3 Eyeshadows - Travel-Friendly

products.description:
BEST OF THE BEST PALETTE: This complete eye and face makeup palette includes three baked eyeshadows in beautiful neutral tones, a Baked Bronze-n-Brighten in Tahitian Glow, twp Baked Natural Glow Highlighter in French Vanilla and Portofino and a Baked Blush-n-Brighten in Pink Buttercream.
INCLUDES BLUSH, BRONZER, HIGHLIGHTER, AND EYESHADOW: These goodies are truly the best of our best! This all-in-one full face palette is the perfect introduction to our famous baked beauty. It includes a blush, bronzer, highlighter and three nude eyeshadows.
HANDMADE IN ITALY: Baked makes it better. Every formula in this eyeshadow, blush and highlighter palette starts out as a cream before being baked into a silky powder on terracotta tiles. Everything is artisan-made by hand in Italy.
ALL IN ONE PALETTE: These versatile, highly pigmented products sculpt, define, and highlight your features for flawless, all-day wear. Just start with your favorite foundation, add your favorite mascara and you’re ready to go!
HOW TO APPLY: Eyeshadows: Apply all over the lid. Use darker shades to define in the crease and blend lighter shades on browbone as a highlight., Highlighters: Dust across the tops of the cheekbones, down the bridge of the nose, and on the Cupid’s bow, Blush: Apply to apples of the cheeks for a fresh pop of color, Bronzer: Sweep all over your face to warm up your complexion or contour along the temples, hollows of the cheeks, and jawline for a more sculpted look.

features: Brightening Face Makeup: Infallible up to 24H Blur-fection Longwear Loose Finishing Powder sets your makeup while blurring and brightening. Lightweight powders with longwear effects. Transfer and flashback resistant, talc-free with up to 24H wear

products.product_name: Fazit Makeup Patches - Sweetheart Speckles - Glow Up Make-Up Patches - Cute Glitter Makeup Accessories for Women - Cosmetic Glitter for Face
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Makeup > Body > Body Glitter
products.description:
EXCELLENT QUALITY - Our glitter sweetheart speckle patches are made with attention to detail and quality. These glitter make up patches are gentle for all skin types because they are made of high-quality materials. With our glitter makeup patches, say goodbye to concerns about skin reactions and hello to gorgeous, glowing skin.
EASY TO APPLY - Applying our Fazit facial glitter speckle patches is effortless! Remove the backing by peeling it off, then apply the sticky side to your skin. After that, dampen a towel and apply pressure to the patch for sixty seconds. When the make up patch is finally removed, reveal your gorgeous new glitter speckles. It's easy - no mess, no fuss, just natural-looking glitter cosmetic speckles in minutes. Ideal for those wanting to enhance their look with a touch of glitter sparkle!
LONG-LASTING EFFECT - With our makeup glitter speckle patches, you can up your beauty game and look flawless from dawn to dusk. These cosmetic glitter patches blend perfectly with your skin, maintaining your speckled appearance all day. Our glitter face patches give you the power to look gorgeous and radiant for hours on end, whether attending a party or another event. You can rely on our speckle patches to deliver gorgeous fairy makeup every time.
FLEXIBLE APPLICATION - With our sweetheart glitter speckles, you can express your creativity to the fullest. These glitter paint patches subtly improve your appearance and are ideal for special occasions, concerts, beach days, and music festivals. Their adaptability goes beyond usual face paint makeup, which makes them perfect for enhancing your natural beauty for daily wear. Embrace the flexibility to express who you are with our versatile face paint glitter speckles.
WATER RESISTANT - Our face makeup speckles redefine beauty with their unique water-resistant feature. These precisely crafted waterproof glitter patches offer a seamless solution for speckle facepaint makeup fans. Our glitter make up patches stay in place and retain their brilliant color and flawless finish whether you're hitting the gym, enjoying a day by the pool, or enduring inclement weather. Take pleasure in flawless, long-lasting looks despite obstacles related to water.

[1st KOREAN CUSHION FOUNDATION with 40 SHADE RANGE] TIRTIR Mask Fit Red Cushion is the first Korean cushion foundation with a wide range of shades. products.product_name: Milani Setting Spray + Primer, Make It Last Original - Natural Finish with Niacinamide for Hydration, Setting Spray for Makeup and Face Primer, 3-in-1 Prime + Hydrate + Set, 2.03 Fl. Oz
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Makeup > Face > Foundation Primers
products.description:
PRIME + CORRECT + SET: Make It Last Prime + Correct + Set Setting Spray preps your face, reduces the appearance of imperfections and then locks in for the long haul. You can enjoy up to 16 hours without a crease or smudge in sight. Spray before or after makeup application, or wear it alone for a captivating natural finish.
LONG-LASTING WEAR: This illuminating finishing spray and makeup primer delivers just the right dose of dewy to your complexion with a cooling, refreshing feeling, while locking in your makeup for up to 16 hours without creasing, smudging or fading!
VEGAN, CRUELTY-FREE BEAUTY: The vegan formula primes, hydrates, and illuminates your skin. Spray under or over makeup to set your look, or wear on its own for a healthy radiance all day long.
TIPS & TRICKS: Hold bottle 8-10 inches away from your face and spray in a zigzag formation. Do not spray directly into eyes.

No matter who you are or where you come from, we're here to fuel your self-expression with makeup for every shade, attitude, and ethnicity. No judgment. No exceptions.

products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Makeup > Face > Foundation
products.description:
COLOR-CHANGING STICK FOUNDATION. Meet your new beauty essential — the ELROEL Blanc Cover Stick V! This innovative color- changing makeup stick starts as a soft white balm and transforms into a silky, tinted cream that blends seamlessly into your skin. With each stroke of the built-in brush, collagen capsules break open to trigger the color change.
SKIN-FIRST APPROACH TO MAKEUP. The dewy, glazed look starts from within! Along with providing beautiful coverage, Blanc Cover Stick V has your skin covered, too. Infused with hard-working ingredients like Volufiline (20,000ppm), Hydrolyzed Collagen, Adenosine, and Niacinamide, this face stick foundation keeps your skin comfortable and moisturized.
DEWY? YES. GREASY? NEVER. Enjoy a clean, seamless application from start to finish. Creasing, caking, flaking? Not here. Sticky, greasy residue? Not with us. Our included brush and the cover up makeup foundation formula is a match made in heaven—designed to blend like a dream for that zero mess finish.
DUAL ENDED FOR DOUBLE DUTY. This clever double-duty face contour stick combines foundation and applicator in one sleek design. One end holds a balm foundation, the other a soft brush with 32,000 ultra-fine German bristles for a smooth, airbrushed finish. The detachable brush makes cleaning simple and hassle-free.
COMPACT & PORTABLE BY DESIGN. Midday touch-ups are a must—but who wants to deal with leaky liquid foundations or the struggle of stuffing makeup sponges into pouches? This dual-ended cover up make up foundation and brush stick is made for life on the go. No more heavy glass or extra puffs—this all-in-one stick does it all!

products.description:
Developed with dermatologists, CeraVe Moisturizing Cream has a unique formula that provides 24-hour hydration and helps restore the protective skin barrier with three essential ceramides (1,3,6-II) and hyaluronic acid. This rich, non-greasy, fast-absorbing formula is ideal for sensitive skin on both the face and body Featuring our patented MVE Technology to release a steady stream of moisturizing ingredients throughout the day and night.

Key Ingredients:•MVE Technology: This patented delivery system continually releases moisturizing ingredients for 24-hour hydration•Ceramides: Essential for healthy skin, ceramides help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier
•Hyaluronic Acid: This ingredient attracts hydration to the skin’s surface and helps the skin retain moisture
features: [ HYALURONIC ACID MOISTURIZER ] With hyaluronic acid, ceramides and MVE technology for 24 hour hydration. Rich, velvety texture that leaves skin feeling smooth, it is absorbed quickly for softened skin without greasy, sticky, feel.

[ MOISTURIZER FOR DRY SKIN ] A deficiency of ceramides in skin can often be associated with dry skin, which can feel itchy and look flaky. CeraVe Moisturizing Cream is formulated with three essential ceramides & hyaluronic acid.

[ GENTLE DAILY MOISTURIZER ] For face and body or can be used as a hand cream for dry skin relief. Holds National Eczema Association (NEA) Seal of Acceptance. Fragrance free, paraben free, allergy-tested, and non-comedogenic.

[ 3 ESSENTIAL CERAMIDES ] Ceramides are found naturally in the skin and make up 50% of the lipids in the skin barrier. All CeraVe products are formulated with three essential ceramides (1, 3, 6-II) to help maintain the skin’s natural barrier.
[ DEVELOPED WITH DERMATOLOGISTS ] CeraVe Skincare is developed with dermatologists and has products suitable for dry skin, sensitive skin, oily skin, acne-prone, and more.

products.product_name: Anti-Aging Face Moisturizer with Retinol, Collagen & Hyaluronic Acid - Made in USA - Moisturizer Face Cream for Women & Men - Firming & Hydrating Neck Cream - Day & Night Skin Care - 1.7 fl oz

products.description:
Nourishing Face Moisturizer — Enhance your anti-aging skincare routine with this moisturizing face cream and facial moisturizer, designed to help your skin feel smooth and refreshed. Collagen supports skin's flexibility while promoting a firmer texture for both face and neck. Enjoy a youthful glow with a gentle solution that provides enduring hydration and care, ideal as a hydrating face moisturizer.
How to Use – Apply a small amount to clean, dry skin, massaging until absorbed. Start 1–2 times a week for sensitive skin, then increase as needed. Use daily for optimal results. Always apply SPF 30+ during the day, as retinol may heighten sun sensitivity. Perform a patch test before initial use. Consult a dermatologist before use. Individual sensitivity to components is possible.
Advanced Retinol Face Cream – Formulated with a balanced concentration of retinol, this moisturizer encourages skin renewal for a smoother, refreshed appearance. Hyaluronic acid complements retinol to help maintain hydration, leaving skin feeling soft and nourished without tightness. This product complements your collection of facial skin care products and daily beauty products.
Proudly Made in the USA – SimplyVital guarantees exceptional quality in each jar. We carefully select effective yet gentle components to create potent formulas, ensuring your skin gets the attention it deserves while enhancing your natural elegance. Also effective as a facial firming cream and supportive of neck firming and tightening when used daily on targeted areas.
Comprehensive Skincare for All – Designed for both men and women, this cream also serves as a men’s face moisturizer and face moisturizer for men, offering flexibility in any routine. It may be used in place of skin firming and tightening lotion or alternated with it, making it a smart addition to your skincare routine.

products.description: Aquaphor Healing Ointment Advanced Therapy Skin Protectant is a multi-purpose solution for many skincare needs. This body moisturizer ointment is ideal for dry, compromised skin and is clinically proven to restore smooth, healthy looking skin. Aquaphor is the #1 dermatologist recommended brand for dry, cracked skin and minor wound care (1), and this dry skin ointment soothes and helps protect skin to enhance healing from skin irritations such as minor cuts and burns, cracked cuticles and dry feet, heels, hands and lips. Aquaphor Healing Ointment can also help prevent chafing and protect skin from drying effects of wind and cold weather. This skin ointment creates a protective barrier on the skin that also allows for the flow of oxygen and excess fluid to create an ideal healing environment. This unique ointment is formulated with Petrolatum (skin protectant) plus Provitamin B5, Bisabolol, Glycerin and Lanolin Alcohol to protect, soothe and moisturize skin so you can get on with your day comfortably. Each of the ingredients in Aquaphor skin care products are tested and approved for their quality and safety, and suitability for dry, compromised skin. (1) ProVoice survey, April 2023
features: ONE ESSENTIAL SOLUTION: Aquaphor is one essential solution for many skin care needs; use on dry, cracked skin, as a lip moisturizer, facial moisturizer, hydrating mask, minor wound care and much more
FOR DRY, COMPROMISED SKIN: This Aquaphor Healing Ointment is designed specifically for dry, compromised skin and clinically proven to restore smooth, healthy skin
CONVENIENT REPLACEMENT: Use Aquaphor Healing Ointment as a replacement for a foot cream or hand cream to help heal dry cracked hands, cuticles and feet

IDEAL FOR HEALING: Different from a body lotion or cream, this ointment is water-free, and soothes skin while creating a protective barrier that allows for the flow of oxygen to create an ideal healing environment
INCLUDES: one (1) 7 ounce tube of Aquaphor Healing Ointment Advanced Therapy Skin Protectant

products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Body > Cleansers > Body Washes
products.description: A body wash that gives you lotion-soft feeling skin? Yep, you read that right. Dove Deep Moisture Body Wash is a new type of body care that does what it says. It delivers such deep moisture that your skin will feel lotion-soft long after you leave the shower. Think of it as a shortcut to lotion-soft skin that takes no shortcuts on skin-loving, hydrating ingredients. Let’s get deep to explain. Millions of 24hr Renewing MicroMoisture droplets with skin-natural nourishers and plant-based moisturizers absorb deeply and work with your skin’s natural renewal process to help retain and boost moisture for nourished, soft and healthy-looking skin. You can count on them to deliver a deep level of moisture that starts in the shower and lasts all day. We’re talking peak moisturization. Like iconic level moisture. Up there with Dove's iconic scent of care with gentle, fresh flowers, nourishing soft vanilla, and creamy, milky musks. But don’t take our word for it, try it for yourself. To use this rich, creamy body wash, squeeze into palms or loofah, massage onto skin, rinse, and step out of the shower feeling moisturized all over. And take a minute to touch that incredibly soft skin. Who else would you trust, but the No.1 dermatologist-recommended brand (us) to deliver a long-lasting, nourishing body wash? Plus it’s sulfate-free, paraben-free and packaged in a 100% recyclable bottle. Our Deep Moisture Body Wash is PETA approved, meaning we do not test on animals anywhere in the world.
features: Allure Best of Beauty winning product 2023, 2024, 2025. SMOOTHER SKIN IN JUST ONE WASH: Our long-lasting moisturizing body wash formula, with millions of MicroMoisture droplets, leaves skin feeling seriously soft and nourished.
24HR RENEWING MICROMOISTURE: Get lotion-soft skin with Dove Deep Moisture Body Wash that gently cleans and deeply moisturizes, leaving skin nourished and healthy-looking for 24 hours.
PLANT-BASED MOISTURIZERS: Treat your microbiome (aka skin’s living protective layer) with naturally derived cleansers and skin-natural nutrients that gently nourish for seriously moisturized skin.
NOURISHES THE DRIEST SKIN: The ultimate thirst trap for dry skin with a formula that actively regenerates skin’s natural moisture for instant and all-day hydration.

THOUGHTFULLY MADE: Our body wash is vegan and Dove is PETA approved, meaning we do not test on animals anywhere in the world. Plus, it’s sulfate-free, paraben-free and packaged in 100% recycled bottles, so you can feel good about choosing Dove.

It helps the skin to retain essential moisture to soften skin and provide dry skin relief. Bio-Oil has a wide variety of uses and can be used as a facial moisturizer, lip moisturizer and hair moisturizer. Bio-Oil is also an oil for hair and because of its deeply moisturizing properties, Bio-Oil makes a great hair oil for black women. Additionally, Bio-Oil is a hair oil for dry and damaged hair and a hair oil for women with all hair types. Bio-Oil hair oil for curly frizzy hair and hair oil for men moisturizes and nourishes hair. It's truly a multi use oil that's recommended by skin care specialists. Use Bio-Oil as a beard oil, cuticle oil, hair oil, scalp oil, face oil, lip oil, and nail oil. The toxicological profile, chemical structure, level of inclusion and total level of daily exposure of each ingredient used has been assessed and deemed safe for use (including for use by pregnant women). Bio-Oil is proudly distributed in the USA by Kao USA, Inc. Satisfaction Guaranteed. Limitations may apply.
Bio-Oil is an award-winning specialist skincare product that is clinically proven to improve the appearance of scars, pregnancy stretch marks, and uneven skin tone. Thanks to PurCellin Oil, a proprietary laboratory copy of the preen gland oil of ducks, Bio-Oil is also effective for many other skin conditions such as aging and dehydrated skin.

Advanced implant technology keeps fall‑out below 1%, while the end‑rounded, gentle, safe design ensures gentle yet thorough cleaning
Compact Travel Design with Long-Lasting Battery: The COSLUS electric travel toothbrush delivers up to twice the battery life of others, making it perfect for business trips, on-the-go use, post-meal cleaning, or office care. It features 2-hour fast DC charging (50% faster than standard) and lasts from 30 to 150 days depending on usage mode. The included brush head cap keeps it clean and compact for travel —no bulky storage case needed. Less charging, more moments of fresh cleanliness anywhere.

products.product_name: Davids Hydroxi Fluoride Free Nano Hydroxyapatite Toothpaste for Remineralizing Enamel & Sensitive Relief, Whitening, Antiplaque, SLS Free, Natural Peppermint, 4 oz, Made in USA
products.breadcrumb: Health & Household > Oral Care > Toothpaste
products.description:
Features Hydroxi, our proprietary formulation of Nano Hydroxyapatite (n-HA) - the same ingredient that naturally makes up 97% of your teeth material, and carefully selected naturally sourced and naturally derived ingredients. We eliminated the fluoride and replaced it with this biocompatible ingredient to remineralize your enamel, reduce teeth sensitivity and naturally whiten.
Safe & Gentle Whitening – micro polishing agents gently remove surface stains to safely whiten without causing the sensitivity normally found with peroxide or other bleaching agents. RDA (abrasive rating) of 101 to effectively remove plaque and surface stains while being enamel safe for daily brushing. Safe range per ADA (American Dental Association).
Bioactive Sensitive Relief - most sensitive toothpastes uses Potassium Nitrate (nerve numbing drug) to temporarily numb the tooth nerves. We use Hydroxyapatite (n-HA) to reduce sensitivity by remineralizing the enamel and passageways (tubules) to the nerves.
Clean & Safe Ingredients – we use only premium ingredients derived from plants and the earth, with no animal by-products (vegan). Fluoride Free, Sulfate Free (no SLS), EWG VERIFIED. No Artificial Flavors, Colors, or Preservatives. Birch xylitol used to improve oral health.
Healthy Mouth – formulated to restore a healthy PH balance and support your mouth’s natural oral microbiome. Plaque is the main enemy of teeth and Davids is designed to aggressively stop plaque from forming and reduce existing plaque buildup, while leaving your mouth feeling minty fresh and exceptionally clean. Healthy mouth for a healthy you.

products.product_name: TheraBreath Healthy Gums Oral Rinse, Antigingivitis, Clean Mint Flavor, Dentist Formulated to Help Prevent Gingivitis and Support Gum Health, Alcohol Free, 16 Fl Oz (Pack of 2)

products.description: Get the gum care you deserve with every swish of TheraBreath Healthy Gums Oral Rinse with a refreshing Clean Mint flavor. This alcohol-free, non-burning mouthwash helps reduce plaque that leads to bleeding gums and early gum disease. It’s formulated with CPC (Cetylpyridinium chloride), which is clinically shown to help fight gingivitis, an early form of gum disease. It provides gum care in an antiplaque, antigingivitis formula that helps fight gingivitis for 12 hours. TheraBreath Healthy Gums gingivitis mouthwash has no dyes, no colors, no SLS/sulfates, and no parabens. Adults and children 12 years or older can swish 4 teaspoons (20 mL) between teeth for 30 seconds two times a day. Do not use for children younger than 6 years of age. TheraBreath Healthy Gums Oral Rinse is not tested on animals and is certified gluten-free, vegan, Kosher, and Halal. It’s 100 percent guaranteed, so you can confidently add it to your oral care routine for a clean mouth. It’s swishy time with TheraBreath, the best-selling alcohol-free mouthwash brand in the USA (based on units sold, Circana, L13wks 2/2/25).

products.description:
#1 Natural Toothpaste Brand, (Based in part on data reported by Nielsen through its Connect Service for the Toothpaste Category for the 52 week period ending 8/27/22, for the AOC market. Copyright © 2022 Nielsen.)Get squeaky clean teeth with Tom's of Maine Fluoride-Free Antiplaque & Whitening Natural Toothpaste. This fluoride-free toothpaste uses naturally derived ingredients to help prevent tartar buildup and remove surface stains. The result? A brighter, whiter smile. Plus, the natural flavor of Peppermint will make you look forward to brushing. Now that's fresh. And when you're done using your toothpaste, you can recycle the tube! Check to be sure that your tube has the blue recycling flag on it, squeeze out as much of the toothpaste from the tube as you can, replace the cap, and place the tube in your recycling bin. Order Tom's of Maine Toothpaste, and discover our range of natural oral care products.At Tom's of Maine, we want to empower families to live more naturally. With more than 50 years experience combining scientific know-how, naturally derived ingredients and a bit of ingenuity, we make products that are good for you and the planet. As a Certified B Corp, we hold ourselves to the highest social and environmental standards. Plus, we're committed to supporting local communities for meaningful change, donating 10% of our profits to charities supporting health, education and the environment. We call this "doing good, for real," and it impacts everything we do.
At Tom's of Maine that means we use authentic natural ingredients. We use zinc citrate sourced from zinc, a naturally occurring mineral and xylitol, a natural ingredient derived from birch trees or corn. Plus, natural flavoring for a taste that will make you look forward to brushing. Some people do not want fluoride in their toothpaste. We produce this toothpaste without fluoride because we respect our customers diverse needs and interests.

LARGE HANDHELD MIRROR WITH WIDE: ANGLE VIEW will allow your customers to get a better viewing angle of their haircut. Add a professional handheld mirror for hair cutting to your arsenal of high-quality salon accessories.

products.description:
DEEP HYDRATION: The oligo-hyaluronic acid in the Biodance Bio-Collagen Real Deep Mask provides superior moisturizing effects compared to regular hyaluronic acid. It quickly hydrates the skin's surface and penetrates deeper layers, leaving the complexion healthy and well-moisturized.
PORE MINIMIZING & FIRMING: Ultra-low molecular collagen maximizes absorption and skin penetration. It helps refine enlarged pores, enhances skin elasticity immediately after application, and visibly reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.
BRIGHTENS THE SKIN: Formulated with Galactomyces Ferment Filtrate and Niacinamide, it improves uneven skin tone and texture while offering antioxidant effects, resulting in healthier, more radiant skin.
ESSENCE SOLIDIFIED: Each 1.19 oz bottle of essence is solidified into each mask sheet.
BECOMES TRANSPARENT: The mask turns transparent after 3 hours or overnight using, delivering active ingredients deep into the skin. So it is suitable for morning shed.

products.description:
Give your skin a break while stuck inside! It's the perfect time to take care of your skin with Bio-Oil Skincare Oil. Made for all skin types, this paraben-free body oil for dry skin can be used to help reduce the appearance of stretch marks, scars, and other marks due to surgery, injury, acne, aging, pregnancy, and more. This facial skin care product has a fast-absorbing, non-comedogenic formula that won't clog pores which is why it is the perfect face moisturizer for women. It helps the skin to retain essential moisture to soften skin and provide dry skin relief. Bio-Oil has a wide variety of uses and can be used as a facial moisturizer, lip moisturizer and hair moisturizer. Bio-Oil is also an oil for hair and because of its deeply moisturizing properties, Bio-Oil makes a great hair oil for black women. Additionally, Bio-Oil is a hair oil for dry and damaged hair and a hair oil for women with all hair types. Bio-Oil hair oil for curly frizzy hair and hair oil for men moisturizes and nourishes hair. It's truly a multi use oil that's recommended by skin care specialists. Use Bio-Oil as a beard oil, cuticle oil, hair oil, scalp oil, face oil, lip oil, and nail oil. The toxicological profile, chemical structure, level of inclusion and total level of daily exposure of each ingredient used has been assessed and deemed safe for use (including for use by pregnant women). Bio-Oil is proudly distributed in the USA by Kao USA, Inc. Satisfaction Guaranteed. Limitations may apply.
Bio-Oil is an award-winning specialist skincare product that is clinically proven to improve the appearance of scars, pregnancy stretch marks, and uneven skin tone. Thanks to PurCellin Oil, a proprietary laboratory copy of the preen gland oil of ducks, Bio-Oil is also effective for many other skin conditions such as aging and dehydrated skin.

products.description:
The Real Snail Essence: Formulated with 96.3% Snail Secretion Filtrate, this essence repairs and rejuvenates the skin from dryness and aging. It improves skin vitality by reducing dullness and soothing dehydrated skin.
Simple Yet Effective Light-weight Essence: A lightweight essence which fastly absorbs into the skin and gives you a natural and healthy glow. Guarantees long-lasting hydration without heavy feeling on the skin.
Key Ingredient: Snail Secretion Filtrate contains "Mucin"- an EFFECTIVE ingredient for enhanced moisturization. It instantly soothes damaged skin and delivers moisture deep into your skin. Perfect for dehydrated and damaged skin.
NO Snails are Harmed: Snail Mucin is obtained in a safe and environmentally friendly way in a favorite environment of snails and then processed as a cosmetic material. 100% Natural, Hypoallergenic, Dermatologist-tested.
Patch Test Recommended: Based on a Skin Irritation Test and a Human Repeat Insult Patch Test (HRIPT), the Snail 96 Mucin Essence is safe to use on sensitive skin. Perform a Patch Test on the body before using on the face. Proceed to using on the face if no irritation occurs in 24 hours. Consult with your doctor immediately if irritation occurs.

products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Tools & Accessories > Cotton Balls & Swabs > Cotton Swabs
products.description: Q-tips cotton swabs are the Ultimate Home and Beauty Tool. With the softest cotton at the tip from the end of the stick to the top of the swab and a gently flexible stick, Q-tips cotton swabs are perfect for a variety of uses. Different uses for our cotton swabs include beauty (apply or remove eyeliner & eye-shadow), baby care (delicately care for sensitive areas), home & electronics (clean and dust hard-to-reach spaces), and first aid (gently apply ointments and creams). Our paper sticks are sourced from sustainable forests. Q-tips cotton swabs are biodegradable when composted and our packaging is recyclable. Q-tips cotton swabs are made with 100% pure cotton. The “Q” stands for Quality, something we’ve stood by since our founding by Leo Gerstenzang in 1923. We’re proud of our history, commitment to the environment, and legacy of softness and quality. Today, Q-tips cotton swabs are the leading cotton swab brand and have been trusted for superior quality, versatility, and value for more than 85 years. Our swabs are light and portable, which makes them perfect for on-the go. We’re also thrilled to announce our Q-tips Beauty Rounds, a premium quality cotton pad for a wide range of beauty needs.
features: Q-Tips Cotton Swabs are the ultimate home, hygiene, and beauty tool.
The soft cotton buds on Q-tips Cotton Swabs are made with 100% cotton, and the paper sticks are sourced from sustainable forests.
Use a Q-tip Cotton Swab as an ear cleaner (the cotton pads make perfect ear swabs) or as a beauty tool.
The soft cotton sticks are delicate enough for sensitive jobs like baby hygiene; use a Q-tip to clean around your newborn's belly button or around your baby's nose.
Q-tips cotton swabs are also great for cleaning electronics; the cotton tipped applicators are perfect for dusting between the keys on computer keyboards or cleaning out phone ports.

products.description:
Complete DIY Kit — 320 pcs 60D & 80D cluster lashes (10–16 mm, D) plus 2-in-1 bond & seal, remover, and tweezers; create salon-style looks at home.
Thin-Base, Lightweight — The thin band blends with natural lashes for a fuller effect using fewer pieces; comfortable for daily wear.
Mix Lengths, More Styles — 10–16 mm lets you build natural, cat-eye or full-volume looks. Add fewer or more clusters to customize each eye.
Beginner-Friendly Control — Fine brush applies a thin, even layer of bond; tray is clearly labeled for quick pick-and-place.
Gentle Application Tips: 1. Clean and lift your natural lashes with a curler. 2. Apply the bond and wait 30 seconds until tacky. 3. Apply the false eyelashes on top of your natural lashes, adding more for your desired volume. 4. Apply the seal evenly, adding more for longer wear. Q: If the bond seems dry—what should I do? A: Please contact us. We’ll arrange a replacement.

products.description:
EXCELLENT QUALITY - Our glitter sweetheart speckle patches are made with attention to detail and quality. These glitter make up patches are gentle for all skin types because they are made of high-quality materials. With our glitter makeup patches, say goodbye to concerns about skin reactions and hello to gorgeous, glowing skin.
EASY TO APPLY - Applying our Fazit facial glitter speckle patches is effortless! Remove the backing by peeling it off, then apply the sticky side to your skin. After that, dampen a towel and apply pressure to the patch for sixty seconds. When the make up patch is finally removed, reveal your gorgeous new glitter speckles. It's easy - no mess, no fuss, just natural-looking glitter cosmetic speckles in minutes. Ideal for those wanting to enhance their look with a touch of glitter sparkle!
LONG-LASTING EFFECT - With our makeup glitter speckle patches, you can up your beauty game and look flawless from dawn to dusk. These cosmetic glitter patches blend perfectly with your skin, maintaining your speckled appearance all day. Our glitter face patches give you the power to look gorgeous and radiant for hours on end, whether attending a party or another event. You can rely on our speckle patches to deliver gorgeous fairy makeup every time.
FLEXIBLE APPLICATION - With our sweetheart glitter speckles, you can express your creativity to the fullest. These glitter paint patches subtly improve your appearance and are ideal for special occasions, concerts, beach days, and music festivals. Their adaptability goes beyond usual face paint makeup, which makes them perfect for enhancing your natural beauty for daily wear. Embrace the flexibility to express who you are with our versatile face paint glitter speckles.
WATER RESISTANT - Our face makeup speckles redefine beauty with their unique water-resistant feature. These precisely crafted waterproof glitter patches offer a seamless solution for speckle facepaint makeup fans. Our glitter make up patches stay in place and retain their brilliant color and flawless finish whether you're hitting the gym, enjoying a day by the pool, or enduring inclement weather. Take pleasure in flawless, long-lasting looks despite obstacles related to water.

products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Makeup > Body > Body Glitter
products.description:
The Original Peel Off Glue: Have you ever experienced the difficulties of removing chunky glitter at the end of the night? You won't have to worry about this again with our peel off clear glitter glue formula. The glitter glue comes in a tube with an easy to use applicator. Glitter glue lasts all night until peeled off by hand.
Made in the UK: Our founder was tired of scrubbing glitter off her skin at festivals, and created her own unique peel off formula working with a British laboratory. This product is made in the UK and is exclusive to KARIZMA BEAUTY.
Festival Beauty Made Easy: Use our Glitter Glue for under eye tears, cheekbone highlights, glitter braids, collarbones, shoulders or makeup! We only have two rules… stay cute and tag karizmabeauty on Insta!
How to Apply: Apply a thin layer of glue onto clean, dry skin using the applicator brush directly where you want glitter to be applied. Dust our glitter on top of the glue and allow to dry. Let sit for at least one hour before attempting to gently peel off from the edge. Say bye to the days of scrubbing glitter off your skin.
KARIZMA - The Brand: Our conversations, projects and collabs with stylists, influencers and celebrities inspire our creations, so you can feel equally beautiful, confident and ready to share your positive message to the world, too! Zero-Cruelty Designs | Celebrity Tested | Expressed By You. KARIZMA.

products.product_name: Milani Setting Spray + Primer, Make It Last Original - Natural Finish with Niacinamide for Hydration, Setting Spray for Makeup and Face Primer, 3-in-1 Prime + Hydrate + Set, 2.03 Fl. Oz
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Makeup > Face > Foundation Primers
products.description:
PRIME + CORRECT + SET: Make It Last Prime + Correct + Set Setting Spray preps your face, reduces the appearance of imperfections and then locks in for the long haul. You can enjoy up to 16 hours without a crease or smudge in sight. Spray before or after makeup application, or wear it alone for a captivating natural finish.
LONG-LASTING WEAR: This illuminating finishing spray and makeup primer delivers just the right dose of dewy to your complexion with a cooling, refreshing feeling, while locking in your makeup for up to 16 hours without creasing, smudging or fading!
VEGAN, CRUELTY-FREE BEAUTY: The vegan formula primes, hydrates, and illuminates your skin. Spray under or over makeup to set your look, or wear on its own for a healthy radiance all day long.
TIPS & TRICKS: Hold bottle 8-10 inches away from your face and spray in a zigzag formation. Do not spray directly into eyes.

products.product_name: ELROEL Blanc Cover Cream Stick V White - Korean Color-Changing Foundation Stick with Volufiline - Medium to Full Coverage Dewy Finish Base Makeup - Dual-Ended with Detachable Brush (202 Natural)
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Makeup > Face > Foundation
products.description:
COLOR-CHANGING STICK FOUNDATION. Meet your new beauty essential — the ELROEL Blanc Cover Stick V! This innovative color- changing makeup stick starts as a soft white balm and transforms into a silky, tinted cream that blends seamlessly into your skin. With each stroke of the built-in brush, collagen capsules break open to trigger the color change.
SKIN-FIRST APPROACH TO MAKEUP. The dewy, glazed look starts from within! Along with providing beautiful coverage, Blanc Cover Stick V has your skin covered, too. Infused with hard-working ingredients like Volufiline (20,000ppm), Hydrolyzed Collagen, Adenosine, and Niacinamide, this face stick foundation keeps your skin comfortable and moisturized.
DEWY? YES. GREASY? NEVER. Enjoy a clean, seamless application from start to finish. Creasing, caking, flaking? Not here. Sticky, greasy residue? Not with us. Our included brush and the cover up makeup foundation formula is a match made in heaven—designed to blend like a dream for that zero mess finish.
DUAL ENDED FOR DOUBLE DUTY. This clever double-duty face contour stick combines foundation and applicator in one sleek design. One end holds a balm foundation, the other a soft brush with 32,000 ultra-fine German bristles for a smooth, airbrushed finish. The detachable brush makes cleaning simple and hassle-free.
COMPACT & PORTABLE BY DESIGN. Midday touch-ups are a must—but who wants to deal with leaky liquid foundations or the struggle of stuffing makeup sponges into pouches? This dual-ended cover up make up foundation and brush stick is made for life on the go. No more heavy glass or extra puffs—this all-in-one stick does it all!

products.description:
Peel-off lip stain masque that lasts all day. Wonder Blading Peel and Reveal locks in color for a matte nude finish: waterproof, smudge proof so you skip touch-ups through drinks, meals, commutes, and workouts.
Matte nude lip stain and lip tint powered by Wonder Blading technology (Liquid Blading) fuses pigment into the top lip layer for locked-in color—no feathering, fading and budge-free. Long lasting, high-pigment, non-drying, kiss-proof wear with clean edges
1-Step Stain & Go - Achieving a low-maintenance, long-wear look has never been easier with our Lip Stain Masque. Apply the Lip Stain Masque and let it set for 10 - 30 seconds, then wipe away with a damp towel or tissue. You’ll be left with a natural lip stain that won’t budge or fade throughout the day, even when eating or drinking.
Buildable Lip Stain or Lip Liner Stain - Wear it all over for bold color or apply just to the edges as a lip liner stain. Re-apply for more vibrance, then remove easily with any oil-based makeup remover.
13 Universally Flattering Shades - We offer the perfect shade for everyone and every occasion, including nude lip stain, pink lip stain, and even a bold red lip stain. Our lip tints are universally flattering, with soft fresh tints that suit any skin tone. And our lip makeup is designed to last, providing a lip stain long lasting formula that won’t fade or budge throughout the day.

products.description:
Blush & Glow Gift Set - Discover Saie’s Blush & Glow Gift Set, featuring two clean beauty favorites that pair perfectly for flushed cheeks and radiant skin. An easy go-to makeup kit for everyday routines or thoughtful gifting.
Dew Liquid Blush in Lady - A nude mauve cream blush that gives cheeks a sheer, natural-looking flush. Enriched with botanicals like elderberry and licorice root, this blendable cheek tint melts intio skin without streaks for a soft, effortless finish.
Glowy Super Gel in Warmglow - A multitasking glow serum in a warm golden hue that doubles as a hydrating makeup primer or dewy face highlighter. Formulated with glycerin and plant-derived squalane, it delivers healthy-looking, luminous skin.
How to Use - Using the doe-foot applicator, dot Dew Blush on cheeks and blend to your desired flush. Use Glowy Super Gel as a face highlighter on high points for dimension, apply all over, or mix it with foundation for a soft-focus glow. These two staples work together for effortless radiance.
Vegan & Cruelty-Free - Both products are made with vegan, cruelty-free materials, aligning with Saie’s commitment to clean, ethical beauty.

LAURA GELLER NEW YORK The Best of the Best Baked Palette - Full Size - Includes Bronzer, Blush, 2 Highlighters and 3 Eyeshadows - Travel-Friendly
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Makeup > Makeup Palettes
products.description:
BEST OF THE BEST PALETTE: This complete eye and face makeup palette includes three baked eyeshadows in beautiful neutral tones, a Baked Bronze-n-Brighten in Tahitian Glow, twp Baked Natural Glow Highlighter in French Vanilla and Portofino and a Baked Blush-n-Brighten in Pink Buttercream.
INCLUDES BLUSH, BRONZER, HIGHLIGHTER, AND EYESHADOW: These goodies are truly the best of our best! This all-in-one full face palette is the perfect introduction to our famous baked beauty. It includes a blush, bronzer, highlighter and three nude eyeshadows.
HANDMADE IN ITALY: Baked makes it better. Every formula in this eyeshadow, blush and highlighter palette starts out as a cream before being baked into a silky powder on terracotta tiles. Everything is artisan-made by hand in Italy.
ALL IN ONE PALETTE: These versatile, highly pigmented products sculpt, define, and highlight your features for flawless, all-day wear. Just start with your favorite foundation, add your favorite mascara and you’re ready to go!
HOW TO APPLY: Eyeshadows: Apply all over the lid. Use darker shades to define in the crease and blend lighter shades on browbone as a highlight., Highlighters: Dust across the tops of the cheekbones, down the bridge of the nose, and on the Cupid’s bow, Blush: Apply to apples of the cheeks for a fresh pop of color, Bronzer: Sweep all over your face to warm up your complexion or contour along the temples, hollows of the cheeks, and jawline for a more sculpted look.

products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Makeup > Makeup Palettes
products.description:
GELLER'S GREATEST LIFT-N-GLOW TRIO: This powder face contouring palette contains three of Laura's fan-favorite baked beauty favorites that work for all skin tones, Tahitian Glow Baked Body Frosting, Pink Grapefruit Baked Blush-n-Brighten, and Toasted Coconut Baked Natural Glow Highlighter
BRONZER, HIGHLIGHT, BLUSH PALETTE: Three is truly better than one, especially when it comes to luminous baked beauty. This face palette from Laura Geller includes 3 bestsellers - a body frosting bronzer, radiant blush, and luminous highlighter - all in universal shades to flatter any skin tone.
ALL IN ONE PALETTE: Love to switch it up? With three gorgeous multidimensional baked bronzers, blushes, and highlighters for face to choose from, you’ll have endless combinations to try. Plus, this contouring palette makes it easy to sculpt your face too.
PERFECT FOR: Mature Skin, Sallow Skin, Highlighting
HOW TO APPLY: Using your Retractable Angled Kabuki Brush, apply bronzer in a "3" shape from the temples, cheekbone, and jawline. Use the same brush to apply the blush to the apples of the cheek. Finish by applying the highlighter on the bridge of the nose, cheekbones or wherever you need to add some lift.
